name: Snap-Pop!
description:
- Welcome to Snap-Pop! -

Help feed Snappy the Red Snapper through this simple, arcade-style "endless-swimmer" game!

Avoid the nasty Urchins as Snappy tries to eat his lunch!

Eat enough to fill your Bubble-Gauge  so you can shoot a bubble, and send those Urchins to the surface!

But be warned; the longer you take, the faster the current gets!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instructions:
  • Plankton: 100 Points 
  • Shrimp: 250 Points 
  • Octopus: 500 Points 
  • Bubble 3 small Urchins in a row for a Bonus 1000 Points!

---------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • Move: Up and Down Arrows / W and S
  • Shoot Bubble: Space Bar / X (When Bubble Meter is full)
  • Pause: Escape

Controllers are also supported!

---------------------------------------------

I hope you enjoy my first little game. This was fun to make.

Feel free to share your scores!
